* [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/): Sold by [Tiabo](/tiabo/).
* [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/): Sold by [Kipeha](/kipeha/).
* Can be looted from dead [Steelclad construct](/steelcladConstruct/)s, found at [Splintered Reef](/splinteredReef/). 
* Can be looted from dead [Steelclad Prototype](/steelcladPrototype/), found in the laboratory in [Arkemyr's Manor](/arkemyrsManor/).
* Can be looted from dead [Engwithan titan](/engwithanTitan/).
* [Ukaizo](/ukaizo/): Dropped by [Guardian of Ukaizo](/guardianOfUkaizo/) (7x) and [Engwithan Sentinel](/engwithanSentinel/)s (5x).
